channel.title: Commands
channel.description: Ok so how do i add a command how do i change a command's coords for example i have ::zone and it takes me to a coord i wanna chnage the area how do i find the coord and how i chnage command how do i delete a command and how do i add.. Thanks also if u kno how do i make a portal that if u click u get teled to a sertain coord Thanks.. :)

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]Also to find the position your character is at you can:
-shoot up a ::mypos command if it is in there
-logout at the position you want and check your characters save file for the coordinates
-add in your own ::mypos command if it is not in there

Which pretty much looks like

if(command.startsWith("mypos")){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

Read full topic

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @bigbaddrag bigbaddrag
item.description:
@bigbaddrag wrote:

very basic stuff, even for me, but i suppose we all start somewhere.

this is for 317’s.

  1. Open the client.java file (server side)
  2. Search for the command name, in this case, search “zone”. it should look something like this…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("zone")) { sM("Message you recieve in chatbox when you use command"); toX = 2381; toY = 3488; heightLevel = 0; }

  1. Change the numbers after toX and toY to the desired coordinates

*note that it may look different in your server, if so, provide an example of what it looks like

Read full topic
